website_summaries.verdict: Keeps paraffin at a constant therapeutic temperature, so it's ready to go whenever you need it.
pros: Designed to leave plugged in around the clock, so it's always ready
Auto-regulates for constant temperature between 126 and 130º F. Hand-assembled
Anodized aluminum tank is lightweight, durable, and energy efficient
cons: You can't adjust the temperature, but its double thermostat system makes sure it stays in the safe, therapeutic range

She also has severe cracking in her heels, and although her podiatrist had prescribed her ointment, (and acted like the paraffin wouldn't be helping at all) she discovered that the two in combination seems to be the only thing that helps.
